title: NBA Finals Game 2 Reaction
description:
Zach Lowe and Brian Windhorst are joined by former Hornets and Magic Head Coach Steve Clifford to discuss the great effort from the Bucks, the amazing offensive response from the Suns, what the preparation is like for the teams ahead of Sunday’s Game 3, the importance of Khris Middleton and the process of making adjustments for coaches.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Zach Lowe
itunes:subtitle: Lowe Post: Reaction To Game 2 Of The NBA Finals With Former Hornets And Magic Head Coach Steve Clifford
